message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away at your share.
I'll meet you halfway on the last offer, but I need a bit more
The clock is ticking, Alice.  I'm offering a near even split. Don't let inflation force you into a worse deal.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still need more than you're offering
Time is running out, Alice. This is a very fair offer considering the circumstances. Let's be smart and take it.
